facility management solutions

Make Your First Impression a Lasting One
enquire today

our company

Storm International is a national cleaning operation servicing the greater Sydney metropolitan area, NSW, Victoria, Queensland, South Australia, ACT, Western Australia and Northern Territory.

A member of the Australian Cleaning Contractors Alliance (ACCA) Storm International places great care on the training and development of our staff, making sure we don’t just meet expectations, but exceed them at every opportunity. Whether it’s the cleaning process, quality control checks, or regular contact from our representatives, pride in our company shines through everything we do.

We provide more than professional facility and cleaning solutions; we specialise in making your first impression a lasting one. Whether it’s a potential client, a student’s parents or possible employee, the way your office, classroom or facility is presented reflects how you operate. And any reflection on you is a reflection on us.

our numbers speak

why us ?

We provide more than professional facility and cleaning solutions; we specialise in making your first impression a lasting one. Whether it’s a potential client, a student’s parents or possible employee, the way your office, classroom or facility is presented reflects how you operate. And any reflection on you is a reflection on us.

Which is why we take pride in what we do.

Pride is the motivation behind everything we do at Storm International. It motivates how we conduct our business; how we approach quality assurance, and how we train and equip our staff. But it’s pride in our business relationships that drives Storm International.

Because great first impressions are lasting.
